get.description: This API gets a CustomAction in your helpdesk

delete.description: Delete a custom action from your helpdesk

patch.description: This API update a CustomAction in your helpdesk

get.description: This API List all default actions provided by the helpdesk
This API lists all placeholders for a module

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Name of the module for which you want to fetch the layout rules. Allowed values are tickets, contacts, accounts, tasks, timeEntry, contracts, products, calls, events

schema.description: Name of the module for which you want to fetch the layout rules. Allowed values are tickets, contacts, accounts, tasks, timeEntry, contracts, products, calls, events

get.description: This API gets a CustomAction By ids in your helpdesk

parameters.name: customActionIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated array of customAction IDs. Maximum number of IDs allowed is 20.

schema.description: Comma-separated array of customAction IDs. Maximum number of IDs allowed is 20.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: Comma-separated array of customAction IDs. Maximum number of IDs allowed is 20.

post.description: This API adds a custom actions in your helpdesk
